Description: Brewing potions with helpful and hindering effects
ActualRequirements: Brew any potion in the brewing stand

Description: Brew a Mundane and Thick Potion
ActualRequirements: Brew a mundane and thick potion in the brewing stand

Description: Kill a mob with a splash potion
Brew a Speed Potion for cheating on athletics
ActualRequirements: Take a speed potion out of a brewing stand

Description: Brew a Strength Potion for cheating on weightlifting
ActualRequirements: Take a strength potion out of a brewing stand

Description: Brew up a potion of Weakness
ActualRequirements: Take a weakness potion out of a brewing stand

Description: Cure a zombie villager
Cure a zombie villager of every profession
Brew a healing potion
ActualRequirements: Take a healing potion out of a brewing stand

Description: Brew and drink a regeneration potion
Brew and drink a night vision potion
Brew and drink an invisibility potion
Dispatch a Creeper at melee range while you are invisible
ActualRequirements: Kill a Creeper that is less than 5 blocks away while you are invisible

Description: Brew and drink a slow falling potion
Become nearly invincible to all damage using a Turtle Master Potion
ActualRequirements: Drink a Potion of the Turtle Master

Description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle
Use dragon's breath to brew up lingering potions
Kill a mob using a lingering potion
Craft tipped arrows of poison
ActualRequirements: Obtain tipped arrows that inflict poison

Description: Craft every type of tipped arrow
ActualRequirements:
Obtain Tipped Arrows of: Splashing, Thick, Mundane, Awkward (called just plain "Tipped Arrow"), Night Vision (normal and long), Invisibility (normal and long), 
Leaping (normal, long and strong), Fire Resistance (normal and long), Swiftness (normal, long and strong), Slowness (normal, long and strong), 
Water Breathing (normal and long), Healing (normal and strong), Harming (normal and strong), Poison (normal, long and strong), Regeneration (normal, long and strong), 
Strength (normal, long and strong), Weakness (normal, long), Turtle Master (normal, long and strong), Slow Falling (normal and long)

Description: Swim in lava while having the Fire Resistance effect
ActualRequirements: Be in lava while having the Fire Resistance effect

Description: Swim in water while having the Water Breathing effect
ActualRequirements: Be in water while having the Water Breathing effect
Notes: Prior to 1.11.2 you just needed to obtain a Water Breathing potion

Description: Get jump boost from a beacon or potion
Have every potion effect applied at the same time
ActualRequirements:
Have the following effects at the same time: Speed, Slowness, Strength, Jump Boost, Regeneration, Fire Resistance, Water Breathing, Invisibility, Night Vision, 
Weakness, Poison, Slow Falling and Resistance

Description: Get all the effects possible during your life (not all at the same time)
ActualRequirements:
Have the following effects (not at the same time): Every effect listed next to "A Furious Cocktail", Wither, Haste, Mining Fatigue, Levitation, Glowing, Absorption, Hunger, 
Nausea, Conduit Power, Dolphin's Grace, Blindness, Saturation, Bad Omen, Hero of the Village and Darkness

Description: Get attacked by a mob with every potion effect
ActualRequirements:
Get attacked by a mob with every effect listed next to "A Furious Cocktail"
This will not work on undead enemies such as zombies and arthropods such as spiders because they are immune to poison

Description: Ignite a Creeper of each possible effect using Flint and Steel
ActualRequirements:
Ignite Creepers using Flint and Steel that have the following effects: Speed, Slowness, Strength, Weakness, Jump Boost, Regeneration, Resistance, Fire Resistance, 
Water Breathing, Invisibility, Night Vision, Poison, Wither, Glowing, Levitation, Slow Falling
They do not have to have these effects at the same time
